entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Track Exceptions in flight (information about the state that existed for the thread when the exception occurred) in native AOT. #98878
  • RuntimeHelpers.Equals incorrectly compares an extra four bytes on x64 #98875
  • .NET 8 - Blazor Web App - Sample solution doesn't work on Safari #98872
  • When min major R2R version moves forward, consider some cleanups in GCInfo #98871
    Future
  • ILLink warns for virtual method annotations on unused code #98870
  • Could not load file or assembly \bin\Debug\net8.0\atlas.clinicmanagement.exe'. Format of the executable (.exe) or library (.dll) is invalid.' #98868
  • [API Proposal]: Support JsonCommentHandling.Allow in JsonNode #98865
  • [API Proposal]: Add missing Min/MaxNumber generic math APIs on TensorPrimitives #98862
  • Investigate precision of the vectorized TensorPrimitives implementations. #98861
    9.0.0
  • Missing TimeProvider implementation for Azure Function .NET Isolated #98860
  • BitArray.CopyTo throws IndexOutOfRangeException under certain conditions #98859
  • [WASM] dynamically compiled method with infinite loop renders the runtime non-functional #98855
  • How to unit test `Activity`, or how to bypass the concurrency issue with `ActivityListener`? #98854
  • Introduction of File Provider Registry for DI #98850
  • [brower][MT] FATAL UNHANDLED EXCEPTION: System.InvalidCastException: Specified cast is not valid. #98842
    9.0.0
  • Half.ToString fails for highest precision #98841
  • [API Proposal]: Non-atomic volatile APIs #98837

Closed

  • TypeLoadException thrown from MetadataLoadContext should expose TypeName #86923
    9.0.0
  • 20%+ throughput regression in goldilocks scenarios #98021
    9.0.0
  • ILC IL3050 False positives when building with PublishAot #98864
  • Strange behavior of the application regarding it's locale #98818
    Future
  • Test failure Assert.All() Failure: 12 out of 256 items in the collection did not pass #98732
    9.0.0
  • Attribute argument of a type containing function pointer fails with `TypeLoadException` during reflection #80138
    9.0.0
  • SPMI: Unknown reloc type 260 when replaying with -applyDiff #98666
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-jitstress] System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests fails with AV when `JitStress=2` #98290
    9.0.0
  • C# Docker container System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: Resource temporarily unavailable (<URL>:4003) #98794
  • Segmentation Fault Error #98851
  • Set DotNetReleaseShipping metadata for assets in Manifest.xml #98662
  • new List<T>(IEnumrable<T>) & List<T>.AddRange(IEnumerable<T>) doesn't use IIListProvider. #98835
  • [JitRandom/arm64] HardwareIntrinsics_Arm_r failing #98717
  • Warning for ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull when passing a struct #85154
    Future
  • PublishAot fails with CodeGenerationFailedException/InvalidOperationException at TypeSystemHelpers.ContainsSignatureVariables #98821
    9.0.0
  • Question about exception handling #98815

PullRequests

Created

  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Improve Regex's FindPrefixes handling for loops #98880
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: profiled SpanHelpers.Fill #98879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize LeadingZeroCount & TrailingZeroCount. #98877
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Reapply revert of https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/97227, fix Lock's waiter duration computation #98876
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Derive OrderedEnumerable from Iterator #98874
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Check if AttributeData for InterfaceTypeAttribute is not null in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #98873
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][aot] Add a 'driver' mode #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Don't set RM field when fcvt doesn't round #98857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] R2RDump to handle System.Private.CoreLib #98849
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Fix BitArray.CopyTo #98846
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] dump JS threads when GC deadlock #98843
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NO REVIEW] correctness test for a perf improvement #98838
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Revert "Add an internal mode to `Lock` to have it use non-alertable w… #98867
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Enable new exception handling by default #98570
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Keep stack trace while passing through native #98856
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • datas tuning fix #98743
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix CLRConfigNoCache::TryAsInteger #98848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Update package version for .NET 8 workload #98853
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Implement IList<T> on Enumerable.Cast<T> for IList #97956
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Add relocs for TLS in neardiffer #98840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix VS debugger compensation for the new EH #98847
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix single-file debugging; missing g_dacTable export #98839
    area-Single-File
  • JIT: Intrinsify ClearWithoutReferences and Fill #98700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator for IgnoreCase multi-strings #98791
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Set assets manifest metadata for assets that get shipped with .NET release #98824
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Do not crash on a never true `typeof(T) == typeof(Gen<>)` #98836
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add missing "internal use" for register created for LoadAndInsertScalar() #98814
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable RLCSE experiment in the perf lab #98779
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: test the new cse policy in jit-experimental #98777
    needs-area-label
  • Cache the InterfaceImplementation for the concrete type that requires the DIM to be kept in DefaultInterfaceImplementations cache #98782
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add encodings FL_3A to FX_3A #98832
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Update DiagnosticSourceUsersGuide.md #98801

Updated

  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GG_3A` to `SVE_GH_3A` #98316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Swift's physical lowering pass for NativeAOT #98831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: temporarily enable RLCSEGreedy to see how it fares in CI #98776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME in objectnative.cpp to QCall #97641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add backtracking stack imbalance detection to regex source generator #98472
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][jit] Fix the alignment of stack slots used to pass HFA argumen… #98279
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • XUnitLogChecker: Ensure missing stack frames are resolved on Windows using dotnet-sos #98397
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Ensuring XUnitLogChecker is included in libraries outerloop #97135
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Interface maps' TargetMethods array should only contain generic method definitions, not instances #98790
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add test case for interfaces without impls for whole hierarchy #98540
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Fix ValueType.GetHashCode not calling overriden method on nested field #98754
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #98485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't run net4x tests with Mono on non-Windows #98767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Use getUnrollThreshold() to get unroll limits #98798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BH_3A,3B,3B_A #98764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CW_4A #98762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Path.GetFullPath(string, string) uses case insensitive volume name comparison for drive rooted, relative paths #97759
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add info in docs about diagnosing Build Analysis failures #98778
    area-Meta
  • Replace unaligned casts in Buffer.Memmove #98812
    needs-area-label

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Review UX and bindings for .NET Swift interop tooling in simple P/Invoke void cases #2518

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] WASM debugging #2408

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add initial documentation for the projection tooling #2512
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • Implement projection tooling for simple P/Invoke cases #2517
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet run` should be able to default to a viable TFM when running a multi-targeted project #38990
  • dotnet test html logger throws execption when using special characters in DataRow attributes. #38983
  • Certain .editorconfig rules are ignored in 8.0.200 and newer versions #38980
  • Introduce "bint" as a new keyword for BigInteger #38979
  • GenAPI needs to cast long value to EventKeywords enum #38977

Closed

  • Razor references version '4.10.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.9.0.0' #38942
  • [ dotnet-8.0.200-rtm.24069.25] dotnet tool install command doesn't show install successful message #38355

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Refactor and cleanup Static Web Assets infrastructure #38981
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Include CodeStyle targets files even when not enforcing code style in build #38968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use `Convert.ToHexStringLower` #38965
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Branding for Preview 3 🐺 #38987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #38967
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Remove getX MSBuild flags from restore invocation #38956
    Servicing-consider, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Use an infinite timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Field and value as contextual keywords #7964

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update params-collections.md based on recent LDM decisions #7963

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing nullability warnings in delegate conversions #72253
  • False nullability warnings for delegate conversions #72252
  • Cleanup Microsoft.CommonLanguageServerProtocol.Framework #72251
    17.10
  • type hints for collection expressions #72250
  • NRE in QuickInfo #72245
  • VB Value Task #72241
  • EnC: Changing the type of a locked expression should be a rude edit #72240
  • c# struct operator taking "in" (byref) fails to report CS8374 when used with "this" and can expose internals / cause stack corruption #72239

Closed

  • "Find all references" does not find implementation of "partial void" method #72083
  • Too much string allocations in `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72161
  • Script<T>.RunAsync not responding to CancellationToken #72179

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve behavior of SyntaxRemoveOptions.AddElasticMarker #72255
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test PR Turn Snippets On #72254
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Allow clients that block on an AsyncLazy to bypass sync-over-async blocking for critical scenarios. #72249
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update target frameworks #72248
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge features/vscode_net8 into main #72247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid performing a defensive copy for enum parameters #72246
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make shadow copy logic a bit smarter #72244
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • WIP: Reduce SyntaxListBuilder allocations in lexer #72243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump vulnerable transitive dependencies #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Guard the 'CustomSeverityConfigurable' tag with AnalysisLevel 9.0 #72238
    Area-IDE, IDE-CodeStyle, untriaged
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Host workspace kind #72236
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Rename BoundNode flag for clarity #72235
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce string allocations from `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72163
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Defer create CompilationTracker._buildLock #72223
  • Keep as much parsed state as we can when producing frozen compilations #72184
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Do all parsing work using InProgressState translation actions in the compilation tracker #72215
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Patterns: Allow non-negative and full integer sets to merge (intersect or union) #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Turn Semantic Snippets off by default #71583
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Option type renames #71958
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState by using ImmutableSegmentedDictionary #72220
  • Set NetRoslyn value for VMR build #71704
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations under RemoteAssetProvider.SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix asserts when emitting calls with optional byref parameters #72203
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce byte[] allocations when opening files #72214
  • Move all the MSBuildWorkspace projects under a single folder #72226
  • Add feature to strike out obsolete symbols #72156
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Way to generate 4xx response when non-nullable model property setter throws ArgumentNullException #54197
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, mvc, plainTextWithFilter #54195
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54194
  • MVC stoped working after update to 8.0.0.2 #54193
  • WithOpenAPI Generates Empty requestBody.content #54189
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #54187
  • Perf regression: https, plainTextWithFilter, plainTextWithFilter #54186
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #54185
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, connectionclosehttps, json #54184
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #54183
  • [WebToolsE2E][Aspire] After adding any component, an error occurs "The type or namespace name 'App' could not be found". #54196
  • Metrics for caching #54182
    .NET 9 Planning
  • JsonConverter not called on deserialization when set as property attribute #54181

Closed

  • Cannot get routeData in IExceptionHandler.TryHandleAsync() for ASP.NET Core 8 #54192
  • Welcoming a new member to our Community Triagers group #50469
    Discussions
  • [API Proposal]: Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters to OAuthOptions/OpenIdConnectOptions #51250
    9.0-preview2
  • Happy Holidays, everyone! Responses for issues may be delayed till early January #53026
  • Blazor .NET 8 [RenderModeInteractiveAuto] getting an error #54159
  • Mix static routing with webassemble (auto, etc) modes #54170
  • Perf regression: plaintext, single_query #54129
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper #54160
  • JwtBearer doesn't populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52820
    9.0-preview2
  • Identity pages cannot be reached after migrating Blazor server from 7 to 8 #52610
  • Updated blazor server dotnet 7 to 8. builder.Services.AddCascadingAuthenticationState(); doesn't call GetAuthenticationStateAsync() after login. Old way <CascadingAuthenticationState> component does, but now causes UI flicker. #53369
  • The ValidateAuthenticationStateAsync in the RevalidatingAuthenticationStateProvider in 8.0.X is never called #53286
  • .NET Core dependency injection not working on microsoft docker container (.NET8) #53977
  • InputNumber race condition bug when holding key up to increase the value when internet connection is slow and rendermode is InteractiveServer #53487
  • DataProtectorTokenProvider constructor with ILogger #53963
  • HTTP 413 Payload Too Large even after setting increased request limits .net6 web API #53751
  • AddDataProtection().SetApplicationName does not allow one project to read values set by another #53987

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b75ecf1` to `9d43b27` #54190
    area-infrastructure
  • Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54188
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters to OAuthOptions/OpenIdConnectOptions #54119
    area-auth, community-contribution, area-security, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • fixed DefaultProblemDetailsWriter Doesn't Handle Media Type Subsets #52577 #54158
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, 9.0-preview2
  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Manually resolve ref and runtime packs instead of modifying the .NET SDK used in the build #54147
    area-infrastructure
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update OAuthTokenResponse.cs #53763
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security, 9.0-preview2
  • [release/6.0] Update Nuget dependencies #54142
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-dsrouter and dotnet-gcdump doc needed when default port is occupied #4524

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add helper scripts to open in VS Code with proper SDK #4523
  • Validate format options in dotnet-trace convert #4514

Updated

  • Replace logging for logging abstractions in netcore.client library #4296

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App crashes when you clear a group's record in CollectionView #20819
  • On Android, using the {x:Type ...} TypeExtension in Style.TargetType causes a compiler error for VisualState.Setters within the Style #20818
  • [ci] Remove mono as requirement #20814
    Backlog
  • [BUG] Back button is not visible on the navigation bar in light mode #20811
  • [Android] - the last characters clipped in the Label with the "Italic" property #20809
  • Inserting Item at index 0 in a collection view with ItemsUpdatingScrollMode="KeepScrollOffset", results in weird animation. #20806
  • [Android] "IllegalStateException: Design assumption violated" when adding/removing TabbedPage tabs at runtime #20802
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius #20801
  • RefreshView: content Margin not taken into account #20799
  • [Bug] [Android] Modal page shows behind android navigation bar after navigating to another modal page and rotating screen on tablet only #20798
  • Bindings in a CollectionView are evaluated far too often #20797

Closed

  • FlyoutIsPresented is not working on Android #20779
  • Cannot create an IOS archive 'TestApp'. Process cannot be executed on XMA server. The "Copy" task failed unexpectedly. #20786
  • Hybrid app with Android foreground service locks up when reopening the app with the service running #20812
  • Setting Binding on Span GridItemsLayout results in NullReferenceException #19803
    Backlog
  • NRE in GridViewLayout.HandlePropertyChanged #18828
  • Possibility to send basic authentication headers with Browser.Default.OpenAsync() #13515
    Backlog
  • MAUI push notifications not received in OnMessageReceived unless trimming disabled on android #16014
  • Navigation menu switching is very slow in Windows #20762

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Cleaning up CI iOS simulator issues #20817
    do-not-merge
  • [Trimming] Fix event trigger trimming warnings #20810
  • [XamlC] Prioritize compiled markup extensions over primitive types #20808

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge latest changes from main #20815
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ci] Upload build asset data to darc/maestro #20785
  • Restructured CodeBehindGenerator pipeline #20524
  • [iOS] NullReferenceException for Span GridItemsLayout fix #20492
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Support the unpackaged format for font loading #20790
    area/fonts 🅰️
  • Add the trailing .0 to all the windows things #20792
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [ci] Add mono back to provisioning #20813
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Bump versions #20805
  • [ci] Update azdo BuildNumber #20751
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Consolidate all the test handler construction #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale, Under Consideration
  • Clear logcat and set to a larger size #20732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] [ci] Remove ForceNet8Current #20716
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, stale
  • iOS Shell TitleView Update Height #20795
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, migration-compatibility, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fallback if user doesn't specify ext on image #20796
    area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [XC] Compile bindings with Source #20610
    area/Xaml </>
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer return actual detected directions #20619
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back #20727
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] CharacterEncoding should be used instead of NSStringEncoding. #20398
    do-not-merge, megapipeline/main, megapipeline/net9.0
  • [XamlC] Fix error XDataTypeSyntax message format #20787
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.5 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Android Google Maps bump #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • Fix crash if users only sets selected color on android bottom tabs #20793
    t/bug, area/TabbedPage
  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-checkbox
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
